"Get some stability into the Mothership!:
"It seems like the chaotic situation in the old
Mothership will continue for a long time...
No matter whether the armored species have
been sighted or not... the situation is in a mess!
Of course, in such a situation, I can't just leave
everything alone! With this, as I think it will be difficult
to subjugate and defeat them during the investigations,
please provide your support and collaboration!

*Target Dragorii Species"
"マザーシップに平穏を！　Ⅲ"

"旧マザーシップの騒乱はまだまだ
長引きそうな雰囲気だよねー……
なんでも、機甲種まで目撃されてるとか
いないとか……ムチャクチャだよねっ！
もちろん、そんな状況、放っておくわけに
いかないよねっ！　ということで
調査に討伐に、大変だと思うけど
ご協力をお願いしますっ！

※機甲種が対象"
